mapper.insert: INSERT INTO joining VALUES(( SELECT global_user_no FROM user WHERE user_id = #{userId}),( SELECT global_room_no FROM room WHERE room_name = #{roomName}), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE room, joining SET room.room_present = room.room_present+1, room.room_max = room.room_max+1, joining.joining_recent_dt = NOW() WHERE room.room_name=#{roomName} AND joining.joining_user_no=(SELECT joining_user_no FROM (SELECT global_user_no AS joining_user_no FROM user WHERE user_id = #{userId}) temp) AND joining.joining_room_no=(SELECT joining_room_no FROM (SELECT global_room_no AS joining_room_no FROM room WHERE room_name = #{roomName}) temp2 );
UPDATE room SET room_present = room_present-1 WHERE room_name=#{roomName} AND room_present > 0
